The airline industry needs to recognize that the safer passengers feel, the more likely they will be to fly. Greater safety standards benefit the industry and most importantly, benefits the American public. The Air Transport Association did not immediately comment. U.S. Sen. that brought them together three months ago. Now, the surging Nuggets hit the road for five straight games and eight of their next nine. "This does a lot for our confidence," Allen Iverson said. To win four games in a row, you get a certain swagger about your game. The Nuggets have quite the saunter thanks to their red-hot superstars.
